Jekyll - Add AMP Pages to your blog

June 25, 2018 ·
category: jekyll | tags: jekyll

We already know the power of the AMP pages but… what if we’ll use in our blog? That would be incredible!

Let’s to this!

What we need?

  • Rubygems
  • Jekyll
  • amp-jekyll

And, of course… a blog with at least one post.

Setting up some style
